You probably love Prada, Louis Vuitton, and Chanel replica designer purses but do you know how those famous artists became the leaders in the fashion industry. Knowing a small amount about the backgrounds these design houses can make these purses much more valuable to you.

Prada: A protracted History in Handbags

Back 1913, Mario Prada well-known the Fratelli Prada store in Milan, Italy which sold leather items, including handbags. Shockingly, he never approved to do business interactions with women so almost all of his clients were noblemen from in the country. Mario died inside 1950's and his daughter-in-law ran this company for the next twenty years. However it was Mario's daughter Miuccia and her accomplice Patrizio Bertelli took over the company in 1978. With her, the Prada name started to emerge among the great replica designer labels on the globe. While Prada had been around for more than 8 decades, the name arrived to its own in the 1990's and began to become the ultimate fashion symbol we've all arrived at love.

A considerable ways from Luggage: Louis Vuitton

A long time before Louis Vuitton was synonymous with some of the most beautiful purses available, it's the name of a French man who thought to walk from Jura to help Paris in 1835. The journey was long but Vuitton was determined to hit your objectives. Soon after reaching metropolis of Lights, he began creating his well-known luggage and that luggage would be the foundation of his accomplishment. In 1892, Vuitton's son took on the family business.
